text: The RK 62 is a Finnish assault rifle. It is used by the Finnish armed forces. It is produced by Valmet and Sako and is based on the Soviet AK-47 rifle. This rifle was produced from 1965 to 1994. Like the AK-47, it uses 7.62 Ã— 39mm ammunition, a 30-round magazine, it has a rate of fire of 700 rounds per minute and an effective range of 400 meters. Category:Assault rifles Category:Rifles
title: RK 62
